internships.title: Software Engineering Intern
internships.description: Join our team to build and optimize software applications. Ideal for those passionate about coding and problem-solving. Apply today!

internships.title: Data Science Internship
internships.description: Analyze real-world data and develop insights with our data science team. A perfect fit for students interested in big data and analytics.

internships.title: Cybersecurity Specialist
internships.description: Help protect digital assets and implement advanced security measures. Ideal for professionals with a strong interest in cybersecurity.

internships.title: AI & Machine Learning Developer
internships.description: Develop machine learning models and AI applications for real-world challenges. Perfect for those skilled in AI technologies.

internships.title: Renewable Energy Internship
internships.description: Contribute to projects in clean energy and sustainability. Perfect for students committed to environmental innovation.
